prompts: Create a poison and dark-type Pokemon that resembles a scorpion with a fierce appearance.
I want a Pokemon that combines the traits of a bug and a reptile, colored in vibrant purple and turquoise.
Generate an image of a Pokemon with a spiky back and pincers, showcasing a menacing look.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, featuring shades of purple with hints of blue.
Imagine a Pokemon that's known for its stealthy and strategic combat style, with an intimidating design.
Design a creature that has an insectoid body shape and is primarily colored in dark hues.
Show me a Pokemon that has evolved from a smaller creature into a fearsome predator.
